snippet: Artbanka Museum of Young Art, a recently opened space, showcases the work of graduate students and professors at Czech art academies.
abstract: Artbanka Museum of Young Art, a recently opened space, showcases the work of graduate students and professors at Czech art academies.
lead_paragraph: Murdered garden gnomes in a Baroque palace in Prague? No, that's not the premise of some bizarre television show. It is one of the 350 works on view at the  Artbanka Museum of Young Art (www.artbanka.cz), whose exhibition space showcases the work of graduate students and professors at Czech art academies.

headline.main: In Prague, a Showcase for Art Students and Professors
